outputs.output_descr:
The programmes aims to promote gender equality and the empowerment of women and girls through a comprehensive, multi faceted programme reacheing across national, regional and community levels. This programme seeks to raise the bar of understanding, sensitivity and responsiveness to pressing gender issues.
The rights of women, children, youth and vulnerable groups are protected through enforcement of existing legislation.
2.  Management of GBV sex-disaggregated data is improved and linked with the national data system
3.  Gender is institutionalized and mainstreamed in all line Ministries

project_title: Setting things right-towards gender equality and equity
